main event: An unidentified bright oval-shaped object was spotted in the sky over Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania on January 30, 1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 500 to 1,000 feet in the air and moving at a speed of around 500 mph.
The object was observed by at least 4 people and appeared as a small bright light that grew larger and more distinct as it approached.
The object had a bright, steady glow and was followed by a short trail of pale bluish-white vapor or exhaust.
The object seemed to float easily through the air and disappeared behind some trees to the southeast.
The witness had no idea what the object was and stated it was unlike anything they had ever seen before, not resembling any known aircraft.
